activities: We consolidate consumer and business data from multiple customer touch point systems.  The customer data includes name, e-mail address, Opt In Permission, country, and company and postal address, if provided by customer.  The touch points data includes email response (date, open, click data) and commerce data (product description, quantity, date).  We do not store Sensitive PII data, such as credit card data.

industrysector: Business Eqpt (other than computers) - (BUS)Information Services - (INF)Photographic Equipment - (PHT)
personaldata: The Data includes name, e-mail address, Opt In Permissions, and commerce transactions. For B2B data, this includes manually processed data. For consumer data there is no manually processed data. We do not collect sensitive PII data on our customers.
